The short answer is depends.

The long answer is depends on what mods you're using. I have a satellite around kerbal. It's geocynced. Does it serve a purpose? Yes. What is it? I use the remotetech mod. Said mod requires a connection to the kerbal space center, direct or indirect. The antenna on that satellite allows me to better control my ship if I am not to be bothered with zoxygene life support.
